This folder contains publicly available tools that I embedded here for simplicity.
We list there the corresponding authors and/or corresponding publications:

* Tools for NIfTI and ANALYZE image
  Jimmy Shen
  Matlab Central
  http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/8797-tools-for-nifti-and-analyze-image


* sbb
  D. Kim, S. Sra, and I. S. Dhillon
  "A non-monotonic method for large-scale non-negative least squares"
  Optim Methods Softw, pp. 1–28, 2012

* spgl1
  E. van den Berg and M. Friedlander
  "Probing the pareto frontier for basis pursuit solutions"
  SIAM J Sci Comput, vol. 31, pp. 890–912, 2008
